replies.body:
This is not possible. The farthest i shot someone in any server, OCN was about 80-somethin' blocks. 

Avicore was 61.-whatever blocks.

1706.-whatever blocks is too far. You had to be on the highest build level which is about 256 blocks. 

And by then your render distance-assuming you used far-allows you to see 256 blocks. There is no way that you could've shot that far.

You could've used optifine's extreme render distance which is 512 meters in length-half a kilometer. So that could've been an option but that would require a computer like mine... plus the occasional lag spike of deathhhh... there is no way you guys did this.

Arrows can't go that far despite altitude.

Your render distance limits you so much.

 But, there is a possibility, he could've been in the void and you were on the max height. Did i crack it yet?

You could've used optifine's extreme render distance which is 512 meters in length-half a kilometer. So that could've been an option but that would require a computer like mine... plus the occasional lag spike of deathhhh... there is no way you guys did this.

replies.body:
Ok. Because Plaza seems to be rather infamous and has a rep in the minuses, I will explain partially. 

This is NOT a glitch
However this would be IMPOSSIBLE if the code of avicus was slightly modified in a certain aspect 
This is also achieved with a rather poorly made map, but you are still able to do it on any map, it's just easier.
We did not break ANY rules to do this and have had a mod say it is legal.
